"Cortes": "That's it! That's the spirit! Let me explain what I'll have you do."
"Have you become familiar with how to use a Floating Board?"
"You know how you speed up if you're traveling downhill?"
"Take that speed and ram the board into some enemies!"
"Get good enough at it and you'll send enemies flying!"
"The researchers said something about a Photon ram, the details of which are... Not my problem!"
"Just aim the thing at enemies and let fate sort 'em out!"
